com.fxcm.external.api.transport

Class FXCMLoginProperties

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fxcm.external.api.transport.FXCMLoginProperties

  • public class FXCMLoginProperties
extends java.lang.Object
    minimal login properties are in the consructor, additional optional properties are available via setters.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FXCMLoginProperties(java.lang.String aUserName, java.lang.String aPassword, java.lang.String aTerminal, java.lang.String aServer)
      These are the minimal requirements for a succesful connection, other properties of this class are optional.
      FXCMLoginProperties(java.lang.String aUserName, java.lang.String aPassword, java.lang.String aTerminal, java.lang.String aServer, java.lang.String aConfigFile)
      These are the minimal requirements for a succesful connection plus the path to a config file with other properties.

      • FXCMLoginProperties

        public FXCMLoginProperties(java.lang.String aUserName,
                           java.lang.String aPassword,
                           java.lang.String aTerminal,
                           java.lang.String aServer)
        These are the minimal requirements for a succesful connection, other properties of this class are optional.
        Parameters:
        aUserName - like "user"
        aPassword - like "pass"
        aTerminal - like "demo"
        aServer - like "server.fxcm.com:7777"

      • FXCMLoginProperties

                           java.lang.String aServer,
                           java.lang.String aConfigFile)

        Parameters:
        aUserName - like "user"
        aPassword - like "pass"
        aTerminal - like "demo"
        aServer - like "server.fxcm.com:7777"
        aConfigFile - path to configfile cfg\test.cfg
